TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CatalogLocation extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Indicates the position of the catalog name in a qualified table name in a text command.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation End = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the position of the catalog name occurs after the schema portion of a fully qualified table name in a text command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this field and the value of the F:System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation.Start?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True field are mutually exclusive.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation Start = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the position of the catalog name occurs before the schema portion of a fully qualified table name in a text command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this field and the value of the F:System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation.End?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True field are mutually exclusive.
